survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Ride-Sharing Apps
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of ride-sharing apps to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use ride-sharing apps?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use ride-sharing apps?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which ride-sharing app do you use most frequently?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional text field for 'Other' (SINGLE_CHOICE).

script.question_text: Which ride-sharing app do you use most frequently?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a ride-sharing app? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with a limit of 3 selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with a maximum of 3 selections.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a ride-sharing app? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of your most frequently used ride-sharing app?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of your most frequently used ride-sharing app?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your most frequently used ride-sharing app?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Allow for open-ended responses to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your most frequently used ride-sharing app?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
